name: TOADER
description:
TOADER is a fun spin on an old school classic. Featuring a simple and fun movement system, you'll experience a world much larger than you are.

After an evil wizard kidnaps the princess and turns you into a toad, it's up to you to save the day. Put on your headset and hop in place to move around the world. Eat flies to build your stamina, then crouch down to increase your jump distance. Dodge cars, snowballs, lawn mowers, space ships and more as you adventure through 15 levels across 5 unique worlds.
